preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 40 g of barium using an analytical balance. 
 2. Measure 40 g of ruthenium and 10 g of technetium. 
 3. Measure 20 g of thulium. 
 4. In a clean, dry mixing container, combine all measured elements using a spatula to ensure an even mix. 
 5. Use a mortar and pestle to grind the mixture until a fine powder is achieved.
